column4: Everytime i boot ubuntu i get stuck in this x server error screen because my display is not right.  when i cancel out i get brought back the screen that shows all the servceis and what not... but it just hangs there and never bring me back to commandline.... It sits at

running local boot scripts [ok] 
2007-10-13T16:51:00.000Z	projecttt		is there a way to force command line at boot?
2007-10-13T16:51:00.000Z	DaBeowulf	projecttt	try Ctrl-Alt-F1-4
